"The beginning of Easter is":
"Well, Easter is here!
I think the preparations for the festival
are on the way, but...The armored
species are going on a big rampage at
the mining grounds.The Festival is much
awaited, and everyone needs to enjoy it
with peace of mind! Please! Could you
go over there to take a look at the situation?
*Target Automata
of Lv.1 or higher"

"さあさあ、やってきました復活祭！
またの名をイースター！　ってわけで
お祭りの準備を進めようと思ったのに……
機甲種が採掘場跡で大暴れしてるんだって。
せっかくのお祭りだもん、みんなが安心して
楽しめないとダメだよね！
お願いっ！　様子を見てきてくれないかな？

※Lv.1～の機甲種が対象
"
